result.execSummary:
The defendant Lawrence S Bufford was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Narcotic Drugs, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Paid in full out of posted bond. Submit DNA sample.

Filed by Atty Alexander J Kostal.
Filed by Atty Alexander J Kostal.
Filed by Atty Alexander J Kostal.

11:04 AM Defendant Lawrence S Bufford in court, in custody with attorney Alexander J. Kostal.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Right to preliminary hearing recited to defendant. Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over. Information filed, reading waived.  Court reviewed the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 1. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment. Sentence: 60 days jail consecutive to present sentence, $518 costs. Cash bond applied. Submit DNA sample. Court granted 1 day jail credit.
Filed by DA Office re: 5/23/19
